definition: A part of an animal's body that is used for movement and support, typically found on the lower extremities, specifically associated with a certain large mammal species. It is commonly referenced in the context of animal anatomy and horsemanship.

examples.german: Der Pferdehuf ist hart und widerstandsfähig.
examples.english: The horse hoof is hard and resistant.
The blacksmith works on the horse hoof.

examples.german: Der Pferdehuf muss regelmäßig gepflegt werden.
examples.english: The horse hoof needs to be regularly maintained.
A horse hoof is made of horn.

examples.german: Der Pferdehuf kann verschiedene Krankheiten entwickeln.
examples.english: The horse hoof can develop various diseases.
